Text:
I get audio, but absolutely no video in: MPlayerOSX, DivX, QuickTime, or Windows Media Player.  Ah, yes, I am running a Mac (powerbook), fyi.  And am getting difficulties when trying to download any kind of codec as referenced in your .txt file - as in, not being allowed to run an .exe file...  

Any suggestions?
Thanks & peace to you.
J
any divx/xvid or x264 needs to be played in vlc cuz windows media player had no xivid or 264 support
it works fine, open it with bs player or something
Agreed. Mac does suck, next time buy a computer for what it can do, not what it looks like.
